poem:
### Carbon Hymn

In the rusted chorus of Drax,  
wooden hymns rise, shrouded  
in thin veils of captured hope.  
Forests whisper across oceans—  
echoes trapped in a smoky trance,  
while decades stretch their shadows,  
and the sky carries  
our sins in its breath,  
as we pirouette  
on the edge of tomorrow.
